website_summaries.verdict: An affordable watch by a popular, contemporary brand with timeless appeal that will complement numerous outfits for dressy occasions — a lot to offer for an affordable price.
pros: Sports a rich, brown leather strap
Thin design looks modern and feels nice on the wrist
A classy look for an inexpensive price
cons: A few customers found the face casing, which measures around 42 millimeters, larger than expected
Some watches arrived in mediocre packaging

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money. Better in person than on here.
customer_reviews.text: I want to first start by saying this watch is way better looking in person than even in the pictures as others have mentioned. The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because the second hand is off center and doesn't actually tick on the lines but instead in between them, very minor thing but it does kinda bug me.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking but....
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really classy looking and I love the brown with the navy blue! I loved it so much I got it for my boyfriend as a "just because" gift. I set the time and all seemed great. When I was getting ready for work this morning, I noticed he had left it on the bathroom counter and the watch was 2 hours behind!! My boyfriend is a very busy guy right now as summer is really his busy time of year so I am not surprised that he did not catch it lol. But I saw that was a complaint with other people too. is it the watch? does it need new batteries??
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Handsome.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great looking watch. Fires on all cylinders aesthetically for me. Well done Fossil. Have worn it every single day since receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice and comfortable. It is a good price and really good quality. I have been wearing it now for a few months, and it is holding up nicely. The band is breaking in just like any other band, and the battery is still ticking along, no problem. I really like the look and feel of the watch, especially how slim it is. The watch came packaged in a nice tin, and when it arrived the battery was already ticking. It remains to be seen how long the battery will last. Anyways, I highly recommend this watch whether it is for yourself or a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: NWRobotics

customer_reviews.title: It looks so much better than in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Im obsessed with this watch! It looks so much better than in the pictures. Very classy. Would definitely recommend. Can’t go wrong on this one. I also have the white one. I used to always scratch / break my watches, but these ones seem to do a lot better for me as they are so thin. (Ive had the other one for about a year now, and it still looks amazing). Wrist bands are super easy to replace as well. Which gives you a chance to turn it into a completely different look. Should you buy this: HECK YEAH.
customer_reviews.author: S. van der Stel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch to my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it. Product is exactly as advertised. He has smaller hands/wrist so I was hesitant to purchase for fear the watch face would swallow his wrist up, but it ended up looking perfectly normal. Great for any sized person!
customer_reviews.author: Grace INGRAM

customer_reviews.title: Good watch. Not as bright as picture.
customer_reviews.text: The watch has a slightly darker color than what the pictures indicate. I got this watch because of the brighter blue color which other minimalist watches on this website didn't have (or so I thought). I like this watch but there are other options that are cheaper for a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: decent watch for the money.
customer_reviews.text: watch arrived very poorly packaged. absolutely no cushioning was used and the entire contents had broken open. fortunately nothing appears to be damaged. The watch itself looks ok, but in person somehow doesn't look as nice as the pictures. it is nice and thin, overall looks fine and I think is a decent value for the money.... just not a 5-star watch.
customer_reviews.author: cincyreds

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Well made.  Probably too large for most to wear.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice-looking, well made watch and it is pretty comfortable to wear. The only problem is it is TOO big. It may be stylish to some folks to have a dial this big, but it would fit better if a little smaller. The flatness is nice, though. The band is good and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch when I was in college and for a year, it worked great. I really like the overall design and the leather straps also. However, I was really disappointed after it stopped working after about a year. I tried changing the battery, and that wasn't really the problem. For a product of its price tag, I expected it to last for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: AKN

customer_reviews.title: Watch that can't keep time and can't be trusted
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch that seems to fail at the one thing watches are used for. Keeping time. Its been off from 1 to 3 hours before I realized. It took over the 30 days for this pattern of being late for appointments to be verified that it was a watch issue so can't even send it back under Amazon return. Have owned over 30 watches and this is a first when its off this much, usually they either stop and stay stopped but don't loose so much time over a short period. Even timex watches are solid in keeping time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that disappointed me was the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is a beauty and is true to the watch displayed in the picture. If anything it looks even classier in person. The only thing that disappointed me was the packaging. The tin was completely scratched up and had areas where the paint is entirely worn/scratched/rubbed off and it was loosely wrapped in a little piece of brown paper. This is troublesome because it's intended as a gift and it definitely detracts from the presentation of the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful stem
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and look of the watch. However, as with other reviewers, the stem digs into my wrist. Hopefully, I’ll get used to it. I wouldn’t recommend it for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lani L. Schutter

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic style on casual leather.
customer_reviews.text: Fossil nails it! A great combination of modern minimalistic on casual leather. The 22mm band is genuine leather and needs to be worked for about 5 minutes before wearing otherwise it may feel stiff. Metal buckle and crown. The long red second hand silently ticks across the 44mm face. It has a thin bezel which gives the appearance of a much bigger watch. The band is easy to swap out. You can pull off dress-casual with an additional black leather band. No regrets with this purchase 👍
customer_reviews.author: Joel Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin watch, but set dial is sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch. It's a pretty big face but it doesn't feel like a massive watch because it is so thin. It seems well-made and I would be surprised if it didn't last a long time. My one complaint is that the dial to set the time is grooved and quite sharp. I like to wear a watch a little on the loose side but this watch rubs the back of my wrist and gives me small scratches when I let it slide around. I'm hoping that the sharp edges smooth out soon, but till then I have to wear it a little tighter than I like.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very poor watch band
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch, but after only a few days, the watch band began to disintegrate. See photo. This is the kind of wear you'd expect to see after years of usage. I've bought Fossil watches in the past and have always been pleased. I like this one, too, but can't imagine how they could have produced a watch band of such poor quality. I purchased the extra warranty, but doubt that they'd do anything about this. Don't think Amazon would either, not to mention all the hassle of returning. I'll try to buy a band resembling this one on my own. It couldn't be any worse than the one I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Deveny

customer_reviews.title: Watch time becomes slow
customer_reviews.text: Watch seem to be stopping after every hour for few min. The time becomes slower. It was suppose to be a gift for my Dad in India and did not test it in US prior to sending it. With warranty not working there, seems like it was a bad choice. Design and look is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Usha

customer_reviews.title: Elegant style, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant style in a very thin watch with a large, easy to read dial and a quality leather band. It's extremely accurate too. It looks much more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but poor packing
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a good watch to wear or to gift. Ut looks pretty decent and belt is genuine leather and the dial has a great finish. However the spec on Amazon said it's 42mm diameter but actually it is 44. I also confirmed at Fossil's official website. The piece I received had some more issues. First it has some buckle marks on belt so seems like it was being tried by someone earlier. So I couldn't gift it to someone. Second the box it came in was having a dent abd inner packing was also not looking premium to me. I wouldn't blame seller for this since it may came from Fossil in this way.
customer_reviews.author: Sky_51

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love the build quality of this watch. It is comfortable, simple, and has a decent weight to it. It's not too heavy, but heavy enough to know it won't break if it accidentally bangs into something. The face and hands are easy to read, and it has a slimmer height than other watches. Time will tell if the quality is as I hope it is but so far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Travy Patty

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch but two things. 1) the watch was ticking and the crown was not pulled out to conserve the battery. So no idea when that is going to need replacement and it's a gift, 2) It came in a Christmas tin and i was expecting a plain fossil box. This is a gift and now it seems like it was purchased for christmas. Beautiful watch though.
customer_reviews.author: krystal hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Thin and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is thin watch. There's not a lot of material in the watch but that's what I like about it. One problem I have is that the crown will poke the back of your hand when you extend your hand back. There are also two loops, one is fixed and the other is not. When putting on the watch, you will need to bend the strap in half in order to put it through the fixed loop. Alternatively you can ignore the fixed loop and just use the free loop.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that tin was dinged and scratched. This was a gift so it was a very embarrassing presentation. Watch was also already ticking, wasting battery life. For a new watch, I expected better condition and treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this watch, but the dial really does dig into your hand. Worse of all, I spent over $100 for a nice watch and IT DOESN'T EVEN KEEP TIME! I expected better from Fossil. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my guy for Christmas because he needed a “dress watch” for work functions and such and he loves it. It looks awesome! The only thing that he doesnt like is that the dial sometimes bothers his wrist. (Update: Once he got used to it, it stopped bothering him) It works great and it looks classy!
customer_reviews.author: ordering things late at night again

customer_reviews.title: Hour and minute hands out of sync!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really unfortunate, the watch model is very good looking, but the watch that I received had the hour and minute hands completely out of sync, making it impossible to ever have the right time. I don't recommend buying, spare yourself the hassle to talk with customer service and return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Had two of these fogg up on me.
customer_reviews.text: Honeslty, I hate to say it but this watch let me down. Looks good and feels good but the watch face fogged up withing 10 minutes of wearing it. Amazon was great and fast in a replacement. But, the second watch also fogged up after just a few days. No I did not swim in it or even bath in it ( which its even rated for). The first time I only washed my hands and im not sure why the second one fogged. Would not but again
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch! He’s just getting into wearing watches and I feel fossil is a great starter watch. Not too expensive but not inexpensive, a reputable brand. He likes the band and the simplicity of the face on this. So far so good, no complaints or wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my husband, and he loves it! The quality and style are very nice. I love the way it looks on him ☺️ I’d recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Honeycomb

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON SHIPPING DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch style and colors. product is great no issue but... AMAZON SHIPPING DAMAGED THE BOX! the product was not even in the box. It was probably flying around the bag squished between other shipping stuff when it was transported. Luckily the watch itself wasnt damage, but seem like amazon packing and shipping is sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is a fine looking piece and was a great gift until the crown kept slipping open and the watch stopped keeping time. Fortunatley I had purchased insurance and the watch has now been keeping good time for 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JWL

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see night or day; great style. and inexpensive as watches go. Others that I have had in this brand last a while. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G Raimer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good looking watch for the money, but not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking watch, but it isn't very comfortable to wear. The crown is big, and the edges of it are sharp. It digs into my skin. The watch band looks nice, and I hope it breaks in well, but right now it is too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome everyday watch.
customer_reviews.text: Good all purpose watch. Have no complaints and only good things to say about the functions of the watch. I slide the watch up and my wrist a lot because I fidget. The little clock adjuster has only come undone once, which is honestly a miracle considering how much I move the thing. Build quality is awesome, have smacked a couple of times on tile floor. Still scratch less. It doesn’t pretend to be something it’s not, it’s just really good at being what it is. Has survived me forgetting to take it off before dishes half a dozen times now.
customer_reviews.author: SchizoAudio

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead
customer_reviews.text: Started early Christmas shopping. Got this amazing deal on this beautiful watch for my husband,received it today and realized the battery was dead! Maybe that's why there was such great discount, bit dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Looks so good! ...if only it kept the time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this watch looks and feels. Unfortunately, the crown keeps coming popped out, which causes the watch hands to stop moving. Alas, it gets an A+ for form but a C- for function.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend because he wanted a everyday watch and he wouldn't have to risk his other watches he uses for nice occasions. Definitely worth the purchase in my opinion. Price is afforadable and pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiancé as a Christmas gift, and it was perfect. It came in the fossil tin as if you purchased it in stores. The quality is great and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Really good watch
customer_reviews.text: Really like the watch. So simple but classy, goes with anything I wear but best for business casual. First time taking a chance in this company and I haven’t regretted the decision so far. However, please reduce the size of the time adjusting crown on the side of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely not take the back of your watch off unless you take it to a watch shop
customer_reviews.text: i have had this watch for a little over a year and all together its a nice watch i noticed right at seal in the back of the watch it was a little dirty so i thought i would take the back off and clean it and when i did i could not get the back on so i tried using a clamp and i put padding on both sides and started to clamp it together and even thou it had the padding the whole watch broke and the back was still not completely on so just a warning
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: In terms of longevity? Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Glass became scratched within three months, dial knob popped off after a year, battery had to be replaced every 11 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't do justice for this beautiful watch!! I'm beyond okeased and can't wait for Xmas to give it to my SO!! He will be stunned! True to minimalist name but still very classy! The blue is is a great contrast to the brown band! Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Annoyingly painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: The stem of this watch digs in to my arm. I thought maybe I could get used to it, but I never did. By the time I decided I just wasn't going to wear the watch because of how annoyingly painful it is, it was past the return window. I contacted the seller, AreaTrend, but they would not make an exception for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch, it’s so elegant and sleek. I love the fact that it has a slim case and it’s lightweight so it’s so comfortable to wear. It came well packed and with no damage, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I've had thiswatch for about a week
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about a week, and I'm happy with it. It looks classy, and it keeps good time. The watch band is nice. My only complaint is that the dark watch face allows smudges on the crystal to stand out a bit more than I would like. I imagine this would be an issue for any watch with a dark face, though, and I don't consider it to be a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for righthanders- not so much for leftys
customer_reviews.text: Great daily wearer. The only design flaw with this model of fossil watch is if u r left handed, u wear the watch on your right hand. This means the oversized dial (which is textured for grip) rubs into your wrist constantly. I have a permanent sore spot on my arm from wearing this watch. But damn if I dont love this watch
customer_reviews.author: P Berry

customer_reviews.title: STRAP IS POOR QUALITY. BROKE. WATCH FELL OFF WRIST.  NO WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice looking, but the glue that holds the loops where the strap connects to the watch head is poor quality. I've had this watch for 6 months, and the glue just recently became undone and the watch fell of my wrist. Why would the company stitch the leather band everywhere but the point where it connects to the watch head? They could have easily just spent the extra 2 seconds it would have taken to stitch the connector loop, but instead they opted for a cheap glue that breaks in 6 months????? Why would you ever do that? The stitching was so nice everywhere else! The Watch came so close to being correctly made.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great for the price. The face is slightly larger than I would personally like but the thinness makes up for it. The band is an interesting combination of leather and rubber. It has a nice appearance while also being comfortable. I highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks very nice and is comfortable. The only complaint I have is that the second hand does not always line up with the tick marks. But then again, I bought this watch for less than $100. And the people complaining about a sharp piece, I have no idea to what they are referring. I would recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Human Being

customer_reviews.title: When I had gotten this watch it was even more beautiful then I had thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Stunning watch! When I had gotten this watch it was even more beautiful then I had thought it would be! The craftsmenship is very nice, the leather feels soft and is very easy to adjust the time and the strap. Also, the hands glow in the dark which I wasn't expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Josh A.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging!
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great! However, the packaging was horrible! The box it came in was all bent and the watch wasn't even in the box. For sure makes me question the capability and quality of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Myqey

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Unsure how the watch works because it did not work when it arrived. We had to return it. Figured that the battery was dead.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Brumleve

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this watch if you want it to keep time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Fossil watch I own that can not keep time. I hope it is just a bad battery, but I shouldn't need to replace the battery in a new watch. The minimalist look is great, you can't even see it on my wrist... that's because it's sitting in my dresser drawer until i can go buy a new battery to hopefully fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to one of favorite customers at my job and he loved it!!! He wears all the time now😊 big savings on this watch
customer_reviews.author: Gladis P.

customer_reviews.title: Battery died within 4 months, now the watch is not functioning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch exactly 6 months back. The original battery died within 4 months since purchased. So I replaced the battery. Now again the watch is not functioning, I suspect that the machine is not ok. This is unpleasant and unexpected from a brand like Fossil. If you can check and arrange repairing the machine that would be great. Thanks. Suman Kundu Nashville, Tennessee Email: suman_math@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Suman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great, and is very stylish. The only thing i would say is that the knob on it can be a little large, and easily pulled out to stop the watch. I've had several times where I've had to reset the time after it becomes dislodged. It's a minor inconvenience, but it stops me short of a full 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Vroom

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My first thought when i opened the box was wow this watch is very sleek. It’s stylish and comfortable, can be worn casually or in a work environment. Overall very satisfied, I wear this watch every day now.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Christmas edition box. Item arrived in great condition, very good looking and it matches perfectly the description details provided
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and it doesn’t work. It sporadically ticked on and off for the first 15 or so minutes then completely stopped working. I can’t even tell how to get to the battery without breaking the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 23 year old son and he loves it! The watch is very handsome and masculine looking. He tells me he gets lots of compliments, and especially likes the dark blue face against the brown leather band.
customer_reviews.author: Joan VC

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is classic and of high quality. My guy loves it and it fits great with a good quality leather band, He got lots of compliments and the price is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: love it now
customer_reviews.text: It was super squeaky the first few times I wore it and it was driving me crazy, but it seems to be "broken in" now. I've gotten lots of compliments on it as well. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Childers

customer_reviews.title: Classic affordable look
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I was a tad confused because it came in a box with tape that insinuated the package contained coffee. It did't, it was this watch which looks classic and wears like a third arm. Just tucked away like its been there my whole life. If you want an affordable classic look with the comfort associated with the warm embrace of a lover, then this watch is for you. 9/10 I don't like it when tape confuses me.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Daniel Loew

customer_reviews.title: love the style wish it worked.
customer_reviews.text: We have returned two! My husband loves the watch. First one didn't keep time, sent it back, got another in record time BUT no winding dial and again didn't keep time. We hope third time is the charm:-)!! Will update. BTW our packaging was intact and perfect each time.
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful MENS Watch
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch but I’d bought cause it said a Unisex, way too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pleasants

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I received this a week ago and I have to say it looks very good. It came in an aluminum case with a pretty design and an instruction manual (which I actually haven't even open yet). It is slim, with a kind of saucer look in the back case, and feels comfortable. I think it was a good purchase for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Handsome watch
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this for his birthday. It is a really good looking watch and he gets compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the name says Minimalist.  If you want a good watch without a lot of dials this is a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I have other watches that have a lot of dials and was looking for a nice looking watch that I could wear to work and this is a great watch. Looks nice and is comfortable to wear. I do wish there was an option for a dark room. Can't see it in dark. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Face is too large for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: It is a Nice looking watch. I returned it because the face was so large that it pushed into the back of my hand everytime I extended my wrist. Wasn’t worth a constant bruise on the back of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Skiracer47

customer_reviews.title: Watch loses time
customer_reviews.text: The watch loses time if you wear it. It can lay on the dresser for 3 days and keep perfect time. Once I put it on the movement apparently causes it to lose time. I sent it in for repair--it came back as test ok. Still losing time.
customer_reviews.author: Rayford K Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Feels light...not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: For being a “minimalist” inspired watch...the head is too big for the style. The dark sides of the band really show, it feels and looks cheap. I am returning
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: My watch does not work! The packaging arrived in perfect condition, the watch has no scratches, but they failed in the most important. The worst is that it was for a gift. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AGB

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée absolutely adored this. It goes perfectly with his suit and shoes for our wedding! It is so neutral and the face is perfect and simple enough to swap the band to pair with any other color band!/ We love this.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son at Christmas. It is very attractive and goes with everything he wears. He likes a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it and can't get over the fact it's ...
customer_reviews.text: For a reasonably inexpensive watch, it is elegant with a largeish face. I'm very happy with it and can't get over the fact it's probably less expensive than getting my old Seiko dive watch repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Although I saw several opinions questioning the quality of the product, its packaging and operation, today I am happy, the product arrived very well packed the box cute, youthful and in perfect condition, and best of all it works very well. I had never bought watches for amazon, I dared and everything went very well. recommended
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Vargas

customer_reviews.title: CLASSY WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my husband and he loves it. It's so classy with the blue face and minimalist design. I am soooo happy with my purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: tiscalo

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Picky boyfriend LOVED it. Nice and simple and silent. Can be worn casual and also a little dressed up! He can't stop looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: FoghornLilies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch! I've worn it every day for the past month--so far no issues. Definitely would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch, the brown leather band and the blue face, but the case size (44 mm) was just too large for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Light, Thin, Great
customer_reviews.text: The case is very thin, which is exactly what I wanted. I can't stand big, thick, bulky watches on my wrist. The leather is also very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband’s birthday. He loves it and it looks so cool. Now I’m thinking of ordering one for myself! Note...the face is really big, but that’s what makes it so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hicok

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother and he Liked it so much great color and size
customer_reviews.author: Heba mostafa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great. It is an excellent addition to any outfit. Plus, you can change the band to match you clothes. The only issue is that the head is bigger than normal, and I have naturally thinner wrists, so it digs into the back of my hand. I just wear it back on my arm a little bit more than usual. Still an excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.author: BillyN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable watch that works with most outfits and occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Sharp crown
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was the crown. The crown was sharp af. That thing could cut you if you rub it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Osama

customer_reviews.title: Stunning watch
customer_reviews.text: My 23 year old son was so pleased with the watch. It was a perfect combination with the brown leather and blue watch face.
customer_reviews.author: June garden

customer_reviews.title: Good buy fragile
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy the crystal scratched easy but try to find some tempered glass to avoid the scratches and damage of it
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Torres

customer_reviews.title: An OK watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the crystal has little spots on it. They may be part of the design or some sort of imperfection. The spots don't interfere with reading the watch, but they seem totally unnecessary and don't add anything positive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and nice quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great watch and the watchband is nice and soft - not stiff and didn't need to be broken in. It was just what I was looking for with a GREAT price - very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Grind

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep time
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch, though the face is larger than I expected. If you don't care what time it is, you might like it. The stem constantly pops out and stops the watch so you never know what time it really is and you are forever looking at it to see if it is still running.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Speakman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Classy, minimalistic watch. Looks great on my girlfriend’s wrist!! A great gift for any guy (or girl).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. The dial on the side is easily loosened though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece, and no scratches on the face from ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful timepiece, and no scratches on the face from everyday wear. I can see that I will want to replace the band within the year, the keepers are real leather but a bit thin so they stretch naturally over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Love fossils. Got this as gift for my wedding party. 4 stars only because the band seems cheaper and 1 guy had to see into fossil for repair due to malfunctioning after returning from wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Heizer

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simple, yet elegant. Looks great on my man!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch, but that side button will rub your skin raw.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look. I’ve ALWAYS loved fossil watch and this was no exception. I had been watching this for months and was stoked when it came in. However, the bezel on the side was so sharp, it rubbed my skin raw. It killed me to send it back but I couldn’t wear it longer than a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jett Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is everything I wanted and more. Super light weight and thin. Looks great on...I wear it at the office and just casually as well. I have already gotten multiple compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ingram

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my son so can only speak to my experience with ordering, receiving and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Drudy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as it seems
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks very fine over all, but the dial that you turn to set up time will collide with the back of your hand, leaving bruises and read marks. For a 80 dollar watch, it is not the most graceful and ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.author: G-

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Minimalist Stainless Steel and Leather Slim Casual Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
Watch Sizing Guide A clean look never goes out of style with this sleek watch from Fossil®! Stainless steel case. Leather strap with adjustable buckle closure. Round face. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. Dial features orange pop second hand, minute track, and Fossil detailing. Water resistant 5 ATM. Display case included. Imported. Measurements: Case Height: 44 mm Case Width: 44 mm Case Depth: 7 1⁄2 mm Band Width: 20 1⁄3 mm Band Circumference/Length: 9 1⁄2 in Weight: 1.8 oz

feature_bullets: Case size: 42mm; Band size: 22mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported
Slim black plated stainless steel case; black dial with gold-tone hands and linear hour and minute markers
Genuine brown leather band with tonal stitching and buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 22mm bands
Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling
